00036 #define DELIMCHAR 0x14
00037 #define MIN_CELLSTR 4
00038 #define CHP_FILE_MAGIC_NUMBER 65
00039 #define NON_RESEQ_CHP_FILE_VERSION_NUMBER 1
00040 #define RESEQ_CHP_FILE_VERSION_NUMBER 2
00041 #define EXPRESSION_ABSOLUTE_STAT_ANALYSIS 2
00042 #define EXPRESSION_COMPARISON_STAT_ANALYSIS 3

00060 bool CCHPFileWriter::CreateNewFile()
00061 {
00062         // Open the file.
00063         m_strError = "";
00064         m_NewChpFile.open(m_FileName.c_str(), std::ios::out | std::ios::binary);
00065         if (!m_NewChpFile)
00066         {
00067                 m_strError = "Unable to open the file.";
00068                 return false;
00069         }
00070         return true;
00071 }

00075 void CCHPFileWriter::InitializeForWriting(affxcdf::CCDFFileData &cdf, bool allocateMemory)
00076 {
00077         InitializeForWriting(
00078                 cdf.GetHeader().GetRows(),
00079                 cdf.GetHeader().GetCols(),
00080                 cdf.GetHeader().GetNumProbeSets(),
00081                 cdf.GetChipType().c_str(),
00082                 cdf.GetProbeSetType(0),
00083                 allocateMemory);
00084 }

00087 
00088 void CCHPFileWriter::InitializeForWriting(int numRows, int numCols, int numProbeSets, const char *chipType, affxcdf::GeneChipProbeSetType probeSetType, bool allocateMemory)
00089 {
00090         m_ProbeSetIndex = 0;
00091 
00092         // Set the header values.
00093         m_Header.SetCols(numCols);
00094         m_Header.SetRows(numRows);
00095         m_Header.SetNumProbeSets(numProbeSets);
00096         m_Header.SetChipType(chipType);
00097 
00098         switch (probeSetType)
00099         {
00100         case affxcdf::UnknownProbeSetType:
00101                 m_Header.SetAssayType(CCHPFileHeader::Unknown);
00102                 break;
00103 
00104         case affxcdf::ExpressionProbeSetType:
00105                 m_Header.SetAssayType(CCHPFileHeader::Expression);
00106                 break;
00107 
00108         case affxcdf::GenotypingProbeSetType:
00109                 m_Header.SetAssayType(CCHPFileHeader::Genotyping);
00110                 break;
00111 
00112         case affxcdf::ResequencingProbeSetType:
00113                 m_Header.SetAssayType(CCHPFileHeader::Resequencing);
00114                 break;
00115 
00116         case affxcdf::TagProbeSetType:
00117                 m_Header.SetAssayType(CCHPFileHeader::Universal);
00118                 break;
00119 
00120         default:
00121                 m_Header.SetAssayType(CCHPFileHeader::Unknown);
00122                 break;
00123         }
00124 
00125         // Don't allocate for resequencing.
00126         if (probeSetType == affxcdf::ResequencingProbeSetType)
00127                 return;
00128 
00129         // Allocate memory for probe set results
00130         m_ProbeSetResults.clear();
00131         if (allocateMemory == true)
00132         {
00133                 m_ProbeSetResults.resize(numProbeSets);
00134                 CProbeSetResults *pResults;
00135                 for (int iset=0; iset<numProbeSets; iset++)
00136                 {
00137                         switch (probeSetType)
00138                         {
00139                                 case affxcdf::ExpressionProbeSetType:
00140                                         pResults = new CExpressionProbeSetResults;
00141                                         break;
00142 
00143                                 case affxcdf::GenotypingProbeSetType:
00144                                         pResults = new CGenotypeProbeSetResults;
00145                                         break;
00146 
00147                                 case affxcdf::TagProbeSetType:
00148                                         pResults = new CUniversalProbeSetResults;
00149                                         break;
00150 
00151                                 default:
00152                                         pResults = NULL;
00153                                         break;
00154                         }
00155                         m_ProbeSetResults[iset] = pResults;
00156                 }
00157         }
00158 }

00176 void CCHPFileWriter::SetAlgorithmName(const char *str)
00177 {
00178         std::string name = str;
00179         if (m_Header.GetAssayType() == CCHPFileHeader::Expression)
00180         {
00181                 name = "Expression" + std::string(str);
00182         }
00183 
00184         else if (m_Header.GetAssayType() == CCHPFileHeader::Genotyping)
00185         {
00186                 name = "Genotyping" + std::string(str);
00187         }
00188 
00189         m_Header.SetAlgName(name.c_str());
00190 }

00195 {
00196         m_Header.SetAlgVersion(str);
00197 }

00230 void CCHPFileWriter::AddBackgroundZone(int x, int y, float value)
00231 {

00233         zone.centerx = (float) x;
00234         zone.centery = (float) y;
00235         zone.background = value;
00236         m_Header.GetBackgroundZoneInfo().zones.push_back(zone);

00272 bool CCHPFileWriter::SaveHeader()
00273         {
00274         // Only continue if genotyping or expression
00275         if (m_Header.GetAssayType() != CCHPFileHeader::Expression && 
00276                 m_Header.GetAssayType() != CCHPFileHeader::Genotyping && 
00277                 m_Header.GetAssayType() != CCHPFileHeader::Universal && 
00278                 m_Header.GetAssayType() != CCHPFileHeader::Resequencing)
00279         {
00280                 m_strError = "The software only supports writing expression, genotyping, universal or resequencing CHP files.";
00281                 return false;
00282         }
00283 
00284         // Write the header
00285         int magic = CHP_FILE_MAGIC_NUMBER;
00286         WriteInt32_I(m_NewChpFile, magic);
00287 
00288         // All but resequencing is version 1
00289         int version = NON_RESEQ_CHP_FILE_VERSION_NUMBER;
00290         if (m_Header.GetAssayType() == CCHPFileHeader::Resequencing)
00291                 version = RESEQ_CHP_FILE_VERSION_NUMBER;
00292         WriteInt32_I(m_NewChpFile, version);
00293         WriteUInt16_I(m_NewChpFile, m_Header.GetCols());
00294         WriteUInt16_I(m_NewChpFile, m_Header.GetRows());
00295         WriteInt32_I(m_NewChpFile, m_Header.GetNumProbeSets());
00296         WriteInt32_I(m_NewChpFile, 0); // no qc data extracted.
00297         WriteInt32_I(m_NewChpFile, m_Header.GetAssayType());
00298         WriteCString(m_NewChpFile, m_Header.GetProgID());
00299         WriteCString(m_NewChpFile, m_Header.GetParentCellFile());
00300         WriteCString(m_NewChpFile, m_Header.GetChipType());
00301         WriteCString(m_NewChpFile, m_Header.GetAlgName());
00302         WriteCString(m_NewChpFile, m_Header.GetAlgVersion());
00303         WriteInt32_I(m_NewChpFile, (int) m_Header.AlgorithmParameters().size());
00304         TagValuePairTypeList::iterator iter;
00305         for (iter=m_Header.AlgorithmParameters().begin(); iter!=m_Header.AlgorithmParameters().end(); ++iter)
00306         {
00307                 WriteCString(m_NewChpFile, iter->Tag);
00308                 WriteCString(m_NewChpFile, iter->Value);
00309         }
00310         WriteInt32_I(m_NewChpFile, (int) m_Header.SummaryParameters().size());
00311         for (iter=m_Header.SummaryParameters().begin(); iter!=m_Header.SummaryParameters().end(); ++iter)
00312         {
00313                 WriteCString(m_NewChpFile, iter->Tag);
00314                 WriteCString(m_NewChpFile, iter->Value);
00315         }
00316 
00317         // Write the zone info.
00318         WriteInt32_I(m_NewChpFile, m_Header.GetBackgroundZoneInfo().number_zones);
00319         WriteFloat_I(m_NewChpFile, m_Header.GetBackgroundZoneInfo().smooth_factor);
00320         BackgroundZoneTypeList::iterator start(m_Header.GetBackgroundZoneInfo().zones.begin());
00321         BackgroundZoneTypeList::iterator end(m_Header.GetBackgroundZoneInfo().zones.end());
00322         BackgroundZoneType zone;
00323         for (; start != end; ++start)
00324         {
00325                 zone = (*start);
00326                 WriteFloat_I(m_NewChpFile, start->centerx);
00327                 WriteFloat_I(m_NewChpFile, start->centery);
00328                 WriteFloat_I(m_NewChpFile, start->background);
00329         }
00330 
00331         return !m_NewChpFile.fail();
00332 }
00333 
00335 
00336 bool CCHPFileWriter::SaveExpressionEntry(CExpressionProbeSetResults *pEntry)
00337 {
00338         // Save the data size for the first probe set.
00339         if (m_ProbeSetIndex == 0)
00340         {
00341                 int resultsSize = UCHAR_SIZE + FLOAT_SIZE + FLOAT_SIZE + USHORT_SIZE + USHORT_SIZE; 
00342                 unsigned char analysisType = EXPRESSION_ABSOLUTE_STAT_ANALYSIS;
00343                 if (pEntry->m_HasCompResults)
00344                 {
00345                         analysisType = EXPRESSION_COMPARISON_STAT_ANALYSIS;
00346                         resultsSize += UCHAR_SIZE + FLOAT_SIZE + FLOAT_SIZE + FLOAT_SIZE + FLOAT_SIZE + USHORT_SIZE;
00347                 }
00348                 WriteUInt8(m_NewChpFile, analysisType);
00349                 WriteInt32_I(m_NewChpFile, resultsSize);
00350         }
00351 
00352         // Write the absolute data.
00353         WriteUInt8(m_NewChpFile, pEntry->Detection);
00354         WriteFloat_I(m_NewChpFile, pEntry->DetectionPValue);
00355         WriteFloat_I(m_NewChpFile, pEntry->Signal);
00356         WriteUInt16_I(m_NewChpFile, pEntry->NumPairs);
00357         WriteUInt16_I(m_NewChpFile, pEntry->NumUsedPairs);
00358 
00359         // Write the comparison data
00360         if (pEntry->m_HasCompResults == true)
00361         {
00362                 WriteUInt8(m_NewChpFile, pEntry->Change);
00363                 WriteFloat_I(m_NewChpFile, pEntry->ChangePValue);
00364                 WriteFloat_I(m_NewChpFile, pEntry->SignalLogRatio);
00365                 WriteFloat_I(m_NewChpFile, pEntry->SignalLogRatioLow);
00366                 WriteFloat_I(m_NewChpFile, pEntry->SignalLogRatioHigh);
00367                 WriteUInt16_I(m_NewChpFile, pEntry->NumCommonPairs);
00368         }
00369 
00370         ++m_ProbeSetIndex;
00371 
00372         return !m_NewChpFile.fail();
00373 }
00374 
00376 
00377 bool CCHPFileWriter::SaveMappingEntry(affxchp::CGenotypeProbeSetResults *pEntry)
00378 {
00379         // Save the data size for the first probe set.
00380         float fval;
00381         if (m_ProbeSetIndex == 0)
00382         {
00383                 int resultsSize = UCHAR_SIZE + FLOAT_SIZE + FLOAT_SIZE + FLOAT_SIZE + FLOAT_SIZE + FLOAT_SIZE;
00384                 WriteInt32_I(m_NewChpFile, resultsSize);
00385         }
00386 
00387         // Write probe set result.
00388         WriteUInt8(m_NewChpFile, pEntry->AlleleCall);
00389         WriteFloat_I(m_NewChpFile, pEntry->Confidence);
00390 
00391         fval = pEntry->pvalue_AA;
00392         if (fval == 0)
00393                 fval = pEntry->RAS1;
00394         WriteFloat_I(m_NewChpFile, fval);
00395 
00396         fval = pEntry->pvalue_AB;
00397         if (fval == 0)
00398                 fval = pEntry->RAS2;
00399         WriteFloat_I(m_NewChpFile, fval);
00400 
00401         WriteFloat_I(m_NewChpFile, pEntry->pvalue_BB);
00402         WriteFloat_I(m_NewChpFile, pEntry->pvalue_NoCall);
00403 
00404         ++m_ProbeSetIndex;
00405 
00406         return !m_NewChpFile.fail();
00407 }

00410 
00411 bool CCHPFileWriter::SaveUniversalEntry(affxchp::CUniversalProbeSetResults *pEntry)
00412 {
00413         // Save the data size for the first probe set.
00414         if (m_ProbeSetIndex == 0)
00415         {
00416                 int resultsSize = FLOAT_SIZE;
00417                 WriteInt32_I(m_NewChpFile, resultsSize);
00418         }
00419         WriteFloat_I(m_NewChpFile, pEntry->GetBackground());
00420 
00421         ++m_ProbeSetIndex;
00422 
00423         return !m_NewChpFile.fail();
00424 }

00427 
00428 bool CCHPFileWriter::Save()
00429 {
00430         if (SaveHeader() == false)
00431                 return false;
00432 
00433         // Write the probe set data
00434         if (m_Header.GetAssayType() == CCHPFileHeader::Expression)
00435         {
00436                 // Set the type of analysis
00437                 for (int iset=0; iset<m_Header.GetNumProbeSets(); iset++)
00438                 {
00439                         CExpressionProbeSetResults * pResults = GetExpressionResults(iset);
00440                         SaveExpressionEntry(pResults);
00441                 }
00442         }
00443         else if (m_Header.GetAssayType() == CCHPFileHeader::Genotyping)
00444         {
00445                 for (int iset=0; iset<m_Header.GetNumProbeSets(); iset++)
00446                 {
00447                         CGenotypeProbeSetResults * pResults = GetGenotypingResults(iset);
00448                         SaveMappingEntry(pResults);
00449                 }
00450         }
00451         else if (m_Header.GetAssayType() == CCHPFileHeader::Universal)
00452         {
00453                 for (int iset=0; iset<m_Header.GetNumProbeSets(); iset++)
00454                 {
00455                         CUniversalProbeSetResults * pResults = GetUniversalResults(iset);
00456                         SaveUniversalEntry(pResults);
00457                 }
00458         }
00459         else if (m_Header.GetAssayType() == CCHPFileHeader::Resequencing)
00460         {
00461                 int32_t dataSize=0;
00462                 int index;
00463 
00464                 // Write the data size
00465                 dataSize =
00466                         (
00467                         (m_ReseqResults.GetCalledBasesSize() * (sizeof(char) + sizeof(float))) +
00468                         (m_ReseqResults.GetForceCallsSize() * (sizeof(int) + sizeof(char) + sizeof(unsigned char))) +
00469                         (m_ReseqResults.GetOrigCallsSize() * (sizeof(int) + sizeof(char)))
00470                         );
00471                 WriteInt32_I(m_NewChpFile, dataSize);
00472 
00473                 // Write the base calls and scores.
00474                 dataSize = m_ReseqResults.GetCalledBasesSize();
00475                 WriteInt32_I(m_NewChpFile, dataSize);
00476                 for (index=0; index<dataSize; index++)
00477                 {
00478                         WriteInt8(m_NewChpFile, m_ReseqResults.GetCalledBase(index));
00479                 }
00480                 for (index=0; index<dataSize; index++)
00481                 {
00482                         WriteFloat_I(m_NewChpFile, m_ReseqResults.GetScore(index));
00483                 }
00484 
00485                 // Write the force calls
00486                 dataSize = m_ReseqResults.GetForceCallsSize();
00487                 WriteInt32_I(m_NewChpFile, dataSize);
00488                 ForceCallType forceCall;
00489                 for (index=0; index<dataSize; index++)
00490                 {
00491                         forceCall = m_ReseqResults.GetForceCall(index);
00492                         WriteInt32_I(m_NewChpFile, forceCall.position);
00493                         WriteInt8(m_NewChpFile, forceCall.call);
00494                         WriteUInt8(m_NewChpFile, forceCall.reason);
00495                 }
00496 
00497                 // Read the orig calls
00498                 dataSize = m_ReseqResults.GetOrigCallsSize();
00499                 WriteInt32_I(m_NewChpFile, dataSize);
00500                 BaseCallType baseCall;
00501                 for (index=0; index<dataSize; index++)
00502                 {
00503                         baseCall = m_ReseqResults.GetOrigCall(index);
00504                         WriteInt32_I(m_NewChpFile, baseCall.position);
00505                         WriteInt8(m_NewChpFile, baseCall.call);
00506                 }
00507         }
00508 
00509         // Close the file and check the status.
00510         return Close();
00511 }
00512 
00514 
00515 bool CCHPFileWriter::Close()
00516 {
00517         if (m_NewChpFile.is_open() == true)
00518         {
00519                 m_NewChpFile.close();
00520                 return !m_NewChpFile.fail();
00521         }
00522         return true;
00523 }
